item.description:
Fellow Bibliophiles,

Maybe I jumped the gun but didn't see much changing between now and 5 p.m. So our June book is Bel Canto by Ann Patchett. Sorry to those of you who were planning on conspiring to change votes before the deadline. I just couldn't wait. Sue me

The voting was very close this time. I might recycle these books on our next poll. As always if your book wasn't selected, stay tuned for future meetings. In the meantime good luck with Bel Canto!

See you at the end of the month. I will do my best to finish this time

Warmly,

Mark

group.name: People in their 20s and 30s Book Club

item.name: 20s and 30s Book Club Monthly Meetup
